name: Runner Infinitely
description:
If you use Mobile Devices to play,  make sure you set the "Resolution" to a low value (30%) in the top right pause menu!!

I was fed up with all those fake game ads, so I made my own. It worked, but it wasn't very accurate。

You can play it on mobile devices through web browsers, but it may not be steady.

Control Methods: Fingers/Mouse/Keyboard/Gyroscope are all supported! 

The gyroscope may not work well...
